items.title: Walk It Out
items.text: A short walk can reset your brain between tasks.

items.title: One Thing Rule
items.text: Each morning, pick one must-do task and finish it first.

items.title: Deep Work Block
items.text: Silence notifications for 60–90 minutes of deep work.

items.title: Gratitude Note
items.text: Write one thing you’re grateful for to boost mood.

items.title: Tidy Desk, Clear Mind
items.text: Two minutes to declutter reduces friction to start.

items.title: Stretch Break
items.text: Loosen your shoulders and neck every hour.

items.title: Batch Notifications
items.text: Check messages 2–3 times/day instead of constantly.

items.title: Sleep Wins
items.text: Aim for 7–8 hours—tomorrow’s focus starts tonight.
